si.t: Web App: React, Web Panel & Web Services: React + Python; Database : PostgreSQL
All latest versions of Firefox, Chrome & Safari supported ; Internet Explorer not supported
Adding any other languages may require additional effort
Adding any other currencies may require additional effort
Multiple banner image carousel would be shown here. Clicking upon this user would be redirected to merchant's site.
Quick buttons to navigate to different pages of the webstie.
The homepage will consist of company details, what solution does company provide to the customers, quick navigation to product details, and any additional information provided by the client.
Search bar to serch the products on the bases of products, brand or categories.
A moving carousel of different for user to quickly navigate to product page.
Based upon animal (Dog, cat, fish, reptile, bird, horse, wildlife, small animals)
Based upon brands (Royal Canin, Black Hawk, Hills, Breder's Choice, Advance, Perina Pro Plan, Kong, Greenies, Billes Bowl)
Display product results based on selected category or search input by the user
List of product based upon the search result would be shown with pagination, searching and sorting functionality. Following details would be shown per product.
Shipping Price: Label (Based upon lowest price store)
Stock Availability: Label (Based upon lowest price store)
Store Name: Label (Based upon lowest price store)
Store Logo: Label (Based upon lowest price store)
Button, clicking upon this user would be redirected to third party store page of the product.
Button, clicking upon this user can create an alert for the product price. User need to provide following details to get an alert.
Price Drop Below: Numeric Textbox, Mandatory
An email would be sent to user when product price drops below the specified price by the user.
Button, clicking upon this user can create an alert for the product price. User can provide price details to get the alert.
An email would be sent to user when product price drops below the specified price by the user. Also, user can view the alert triggert on alert panel.
Notify would trigger once for the product and then auto expire.
Dropdown, clicking upon this user can view other details and prices. Per store we would shown following details
Filter the list of product on different parameters
User can filter the list of the products on the bases of pet types (e.g., Dog, Cat, etc.)
Parameter in filter would be dynamic based upon the scrap data from the store website.
User can filter the list of the products on the bases of categories (e.g., Clothing, Food, Harnes etc.)
User can filter the list of the products on the bases of product brands (e.g., Royal Canin, Black Hawk, Hills, Breder's Choice etc.)
User can filter the list of the products on the bases of life stage for pets (e.g., Adult, Baby, Senior etc.)
User can filter the list of the products on the bases of price range.
User can filter the list of the products on the bases of stores
Store added on the admin side would be visible to filter the products data.
Sort the list of the product on different parameters.
Product can be sorted on the bases of price (high to low).
Product can be sorted on the bases of price (low to high).
Label, last time the price was updated on backend side
List of all the blogs posted by the admin would be shown here. Following details would be displayed on this page.
Textbox, user can search the blog on the bases of title and author name.
List of blogs would be shown here with pagination and searching functionality.
Button, clicking upon this user would be redirected to blog detailed page.
Following details would be shown here.
Button, clicking upon this the link for the blog would be copied in the clipboard which can be shared outside the system.
3-4 cards showcasing blogs published by the author with following details
Clicking upon the card user would be redirected to blog detailed page.
This would be static based chatbot where user can see predefined questions and click upon the question to generate the answers. Following details would be shown on the chatbot.
Predefined question as button. Clicking upon it answer responses would be generated.
User can also ask question and answer would be generated based upon tag matching defined.
To clear all the chat and restart.
Textbox, mandatory field, alphabetic inputs only
Textbox, mandatory, with email address validation.
Must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, one symbol, and be a minimum of 8 characters.
Same rules as Password. Must match the Password entered above.
User must select a checkbox to agree to the Terms & Conditions. A link will be available to open the Terms & Conditions page.
Once all details are entered and valid, the user can submit the form and the account will be created.
Once the form is submitted, an email with a verification link will be sent to the email address provided by the user
The user clicks the link to verify the email and activate the account.
User can reset the password by :
User will receive an email with a verification link on the verified email address
When the user clicks the link, they are taken to a screen where they can enter and confirm a new password.
The following options will be shown in the site menu. User can navigate to the various sections from here
This will take the user to the 'My Profile' screen
This will take the user to the 'My Alert' screen
This will take the user to the 'Contact Us' screen
This will take the user to the 'About Us' screen
This will take the user to the 'Terms and Conditions' screen
This will take the user to the 'Privacy Policy' screen
This will take the user to the 'FAQ' screen
This will log the user out of the site
Following page would consist all the alerts generated for the user price alerts. Following details would be displayed here.
All the alerts triggered as per 'Notify Me' request of the user would be shown here. Following details would be displayed here.
Static message about price going below the price for which alert was set.
Clicking upon the alert user would be redirected to the compare page (and would show product for which alert was triggered).
Clicking upon this user can clear all the alert triggered
Following details would be shown on the profile page.
Following details would be shown here
Initially empty; user can upload from local storage or capture using their device.
If no picture is added, the first letter of the first name and the first letter of the last name will be shown as initials (e.g., John Doe → “JD”).
Textbox – must contain one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, one symbol, minimum 8 characters.
Textbox – same rules as New Password; must match the New Password.
Textbox; user can enter or edit their bio.

si.t: Super admin can add the content for the following pages of the platform.
This would be a rich textbox editor.
Any queries that the user sent via the 'Contact Us' form will be shown here
Admin can view the query, timestamp, and user details.
Admin will contact the user outside the system if needed.
Once resolved, admin can mark the query as closed.
Architect and deploy robust crawlers to ingest pricing and stock data from 50+ Australian retailers every 24 hours.

Automated scrapers or data feeds crawl each partner store’s category and product pages on a schedule, extract structured product data using predefined rules, and continuously sync it into the system without manual intervention.
Ensure zero-downtime performance and strict adherence to anti-bot measures (proxy management, fingerprinting).
This is the core requirement. We need a system that automatically maps disparate retailer data to a single "Master SKU."
The system must intelligently handle variations: e.g., mapping "Royal Canin G.Shepherd 3kg" and "RC German Shepherd Adult 3000g" to the same entity without manual intervention.

Must utilize advanced logic (Waterfall matching, GTIN/EAN priority, Vector Embeddings, or NLP attribute extraction) to ensure a very high accuracy. Misleading users with unmatched products is not an option.
Query raised by user, via 'Contact Us' form
One time deployment on LIVE server only

Logo design hours not included.
Standard design hours had been considered. Please let us know if you have any other specific design requirements.
Efforts may vary if anything is added / updated from mentioned features list
The Third-party tools / plugins / APIs will be purchased and provided by client
The efforts for deployment are considered for one time deployment on LIVE server only
Default email templates will be used, it will require additional effort to create custom email templates
